items.title: Record labels claim AI generator Suno illegally ripped their songs from YouTube
items.summary: Major record labels have escalated their lawsuit against Suno, alleging that the AI startup knowingly pirated songs from YouTube to train its generative AI music models. In the amended complaint filed on September 19th, the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) accuses Suno of unlawfully “stream ripping” tracks on YouTube — a practice that involves […]

items.title: Sources: smart ring maker Oura is raising an $875M+ Series E at a $10.9B valuation, up from $5B in November 2024, and has sold ~3M rings over the past year (Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Bloomberg:
Sources: smart ring maker Oura is raising an $875M+ Series E at a $10.9B valuation, up from $5B in November 2024, and has sold ~3M rings over the past year  —  Oura Health Oy, the maker of the popular Oura health and fitness ring, is closing in on a roughly $11 billion valuation after selling about 3 million rings over the past year.

items.title: 5 days left to save up to $668 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 pass
items.summary:
Register for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 by September 26 and save up to $668 before Regular Bird pricing disappears.

Disrupt 2025 gives you an exclusive look at tomorrow's tech. Founders can connect with the right investors and partners to scale their startups. Investors can discover their next portfolio company. Tech innovators and visionaries can glimpse the future of technology while building the connections that help them grow.

items.title: Z GRILLS’ Cruiser tailgate companion portable pellet grill & smoker hits best price of the year at new $150 low
items.summary:
Update 9/22: Z GRILLS has dropped the price further on its Cruiser 200A Portable Pellet Grill and Smoker to a new all-time low of $150.05 shipped.

Through its official Amazon storefront, Z GRILLS is offering its Cruiser 200A Pro Portable Pellet Grill and Smoker for $217.55 shipped. While it carries a $335 MSRP, it usually starts lower between $273 and $289 at Amazon, with prices having kept above $236 throughout 2025. While we have seen it go as low as $215 in the past, you’re looking at a $117 markdown off the MSRP for the best price we have seen this year and the second-lowest overall. It’s a great opportunity to stock up for your tailgating season or fall outings while it lasts. Head below to learn more about what it brings to your gatherings.

more…

items.title: Fractal Design’s beautiful new Meshify 3 RGB PC case now starts from $130 (All-time low)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Fractal Design’s new Meshify 3 RGB E-ATX PC case in black down to $129.99 shipped. This model is part of the brand’s latest lineup that launched in May with a $160 starting price. The black variant on sale today has lately been fetching as high as $175, but this offer cuts that down by 26% with a $45 discount. That marks the lowest price we’ve tracked yet for this new PC case, which comes bundled with three RGB fans. For those who want to step up, Newegg also has a more premium Ambience Pro version featuring atmospheric RGB lighting and an ARGB controller for $199.99 shipped, down from its regular $275. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: T-Mobile CEO Mike Sievert is stepping down
items.summary: T-Mobile is replacing Mike Sievert as CEO more than five years after he took on the role. Sievert took over for the outspoken John Legere following T-Mobile’s merger with Sprint in 2020. While at the […]

That means the Mario Kart World deal, for example, will drop from the $69.99 sale price down to $62.99 Prime shipped – that’s one of the lowest prices this Switch 2 game has ever been offered for with nearly 22% slashed from its regular $80 list price. items.title: Don’t miss out on Anker’s popular PowerCore Reserve 60,000mAh power station while it’s back at $80 (Reg. $150)
items.summary:
Through the official Amazon storefront, Anker is giving folks another chance at its PowerCore Reserve 60,000mAh Power Station for $79.99 shipped in both of its colorways, which beats out the brand’s direct website pricing by $67. Without discounts, you’d be shelling out $150 in total for this popular model, with the discounts we have seen often dropping the price between $110 and $90, with a few falls lower to $80, and a one-time drop to its $75 low back during July’s Prime Day event. Outside of that short-lived Prime Day pricing, you’re looking at the best price we have seen repeat over the year, giving you $70 in savings and landing it back at its second-lowest overall price a month after its last appearance.

That said, you can land one right now at Amazon with a giant $400 discount.
